text:
@GOP @realDonaldTrump Yes amazing he plays " Live and Let Die" and doesn't wear a mask while 77,000 Americans have lost their lives due to @realDonaldTrump not preparing our hospitals and work places for #COVID19 in January. 3,000 deaths a day by June 1st.
#NineElevenEveryDay https://t.co/3QzaPO3OX6
